rundown: 7-12 L vs New York Mets Erick Fedde: 4.1 innings, 6 earned runs, 11 hits, 1 HR, 1 strikeouts Batters: Jurickson Profar (3 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 4 RBI) Ronald Acuña Jr. (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) Vidal Bruján (1 hit - 3 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves fell to the New York Mets in a high-scoring affair, unable to keep pace with their opponent's offensive onslaught. The Mets out-hit the Braves 21 to 10, which was a significant factor in the loss. Key highlights from the game include: 1. Jurickson Profar's standout performance with 3 hits and 4 RBIs. 2. Ronald Acuña Jr. contributed with a home run and 2 RBIs. 3. Erick Fedde struggled on the mound, allowing 6 earned runs in just over 4 innings.
